fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Do not spend gems on lucky draws (fusion is cheaper).
• When in doubt, choose a legendary troops over epic troops.
• When in doubt, choose a 9-load troops over single-load troops

fields.name: Info
fields.value:
• Around 210-250M gold is needed for a level-8 Frost Archers
• Around 80-150M gold is needed for a level-8 Peltasts

fields.name: Example
fields.value: Attached is a figure of actual troops draws by an AoW player spending 168M coins on September 28, 2021
